cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on May 5, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2348, Advancing Conservation and Education Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 59 (Thursday, April 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. STEWART:
H.R. 2348.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Tenth Amendment, United States Constitution Article IV,
section 3, clause 2
[Page H1708]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 492.

title: Advancing Conservation and Education Act
